section.title: Conformance statements
section.para: The keywords "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in .
The normative and informative appendices to this specification are identified by the labels "(normative)" and "(informative)" in their titles, respectively.
All examples in this specification are informative.
